$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|$w0|There is no enemy my arrows cannot
reach. Now then, let us go. I shall
protect you.$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Uh, wait a moment, Innes. You're
an archer... Wouldn't it make more
sense if you stayed behind me?$k$p$Sbs1000|
